column4: can anyone help me with getting the drivers working for my ati radeon 9800? they are giving me lots of trouble.
i may be able to
what's the exact problem?
yay :D... anyway as you can see from this ss: http://img78.imageshack.us/img78/84/screenshotwb0.png i have the drivers enabled in the hardware manager but i still get no direct rendering
i tried installing them from envy but every time i just got a white screen when i tried to log in, the only way i could see stuff if i used a 'failsafe gnome' session
and it worked before. Im positive that if i reinstall ubuntu it would work fine but i really dont want to reinstall =/
did you just upgrade from gutsy to hardy?
this installation is a upgrade from gutsy but i upgraded a couple days before hardy came out.
k.
check to see if linux-restricted-modules is in there
it wasnt installed O.O
ill go restart x and see if that magically fixed it.
heh. that showed up on the bugs page... might be it; might not be
direct rendering: Yes :D
nice
can i have the bug page you were looking at?
doh , i closed it, lemme pull it up
thanks
my problem was different; it was an actual fglrx issue and i had to nuke envy and the driver
ah.
and i still can't find the issue, someone in #compiz is who actually told me
what was the command to check direct rendering?
glxinfo | grep direct
